author: Special Correspondent
text:
The cadre of the constituents of People’s Welfare Front (PWF) staged a demonstration in front of the head post office here on Tuesday condemning the arrest of Kanhaiya Kumar and other leaders of the students union of Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) under sedition charges.

Freedom of speech

They also condemned the attack on the central office of the CPI (M) in New Delhi, attack on freedom of speech.

Outfits

They also condemned the BJP and its saffron outfits for unleashing violence.

District secretary of the CPI A. Mohan led the agitation, in which P. Shanmugam, state committee member of the CPI (M), P. Thangavel, district secretary of the CPI (M), and leaders of other constituent parties participated.
title: PWF protests arrest of JNU student leader
